original: Naganthasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na gantha sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na gantha sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naganthasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na gantha sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na gantha vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naganthasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthasampayutto ca naganthavippayutto ca dhammā
analyzed: na gantha sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na gantha sampayuttaḥ ca na gantha vippayuttaḥ ca dhammā

original: Naganthavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na gantha vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na gantha vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naganthavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na gantha vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na gantha sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naganthavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthasampayutto ca naganthavippayutto ca dhammā
analyzed: na gantha vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na gantha sampayuttaḥ ca na gantha vippayuttaḥ ca dhammā

original: Naganthasampayuttañca naganthavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthasampayutto dhammo
analyzed: na gantha sampayuttañca na gantha vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca na gantha sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthasampayuttañca naganthavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na gantha sampayuttañca na gantha vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca

original: naganthavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthasampayuttañca naganthavippayuttañca
analyzed: na gantha vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na gantha sampayuttañca na gantha vippayuttañca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthasampayutto ca naganthavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na gantha sampayutto ca na gantha vippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe cha adhipatiyā nava pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava sabbattha vitthāro
